snippet: In the latest installment of the Source, a series of conversations on the roots of creativity, the artist Doug Aitken interviews the actress Tilda Swinton, who talks about identity, language and performance.
abstract: In the latest installment of the Source, a series of conversations on the roots of creativity, the artist Doug Aitken interviews the actress Tilda Swinton, who talks about identity, language and performance.

headline.main: The Source | Tilda Swinton in Conversation With Doug Aitken
